turns.text: Okay so what are what are your views on capital punishment
turns.label: o

turns.text: I have ambivalent feelings because I dont think it serves as kind of deterrent we would like to think it is But on the other hand it is very very expensive to maintain you know Texas has one of the biggest criminal justice systems in the country
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And its eating us alive budget wise and uh -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So are they currently practicing capital punishment --
turns.label: qy

turns.text: -- do practice capital punishment but the nature of the uh courts and the appeals and the stays and all that means that its very long haul before anybodys ever executed

Yeah And then I was reading in the paper just this morning its interesting because I had forgotten I guess that I wrote this little topic down that it costs more to execute somebody th- than it does to keep them
turns.label: b

turns.text: Because of all the costs of the appeals and all that --
Yes uh I guess in way that it it kind of defeats the purpose of having capital punishment if -
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well I think capital punishment is supposed to be primarily deterrent to other people
turns.label: sv

turns.text: You know who would see it
Right that would be the intent of it
turns.label: aa

turns.text: Yeah but Im not sure how successful that is
turns.label: b

turns.text: Well I think it would be more successful if it was applied in more expedient manner if there werent so many --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah if if the person whos going to commit the crime --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- knew that they were going to be punished severely possibly capital punishment -
What what kind of work do you do
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Uh Im research engineer I work uh - with Georgia Tech
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Um well see Im school principal
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And in very poor section of town with - predominantly Anglo kids And I see kids already that are going to be criminals --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- in spite of everything we can do and see Im afraid I think if we would take the equivalent amount of money and invest it in young people that - I mean course you couldnt do that because you got to do something with the ones that are already there --
-- but I think we would make bigger investment in kids wed have fewer decisions to make
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Um thats probably true but I guess --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: But - - pumping more money into the school system is --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- good thing but its not going to -
-- Im not talking about just in the school system

See Im talking about - like in in - uh Im afraid I think that there are kids who just ought to be taken out of their homes and reared Uh I know the institutions dont work that well but its bad day because I get all these kids through my office I have school of five hundred and thirty-seven kids
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Five hundred of them are good solid kids and I have the same thirty-seven in my office every day
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And lot of their parents are totally irresponsible Some of them in the penal system
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And you know you just see those kids going down the road Now not all of them will commit offenses that have to do with capital punishment but some of them have already been in youth centers
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And that kind of thing and if we had something to do before they get to be full-blown adult criminals and Im not talking about necessarily in the school system Im not sure that the school system should be the agent of all the social action
I think thats one reason we have problems in schools uh and some of them are our problems but lot of its because everything society wants we are supposed to do
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Anyway I dealt with two or three kids today that are going to end up where somebody has making decision what to do with them
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Um yeah I guess thats not an easy solution Theres theres no easy --
turns.label: b

turns.text: I dont I dont know that there is an easy solution but if you could find way to prevent some of it and Im not sure what it would be
turns.label: aa

Um yeah I dont I dont - certainly capital punishment isnt --
